grupp1.othello.controller

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • grupp1.othello.controller.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the main game class. This class handles game logic etc.
    Author:
    Philip Arvidsson (S133686)

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove(int x,
                           int y,
                           int player)
        Checks whether it is considered a valid move to place a disk for the specified player on the board at the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the cell to check.
        y - The x-coordinate of the cell to check.
        player - The player (player one or player two).
        Returns:
        True if the specified move is considered valid.

      • findValidDiskPlacements

        public DiskPlacement[] findValidDiskPlacements(int player)
        Finds all valid disk placements and returns them in an array.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to find valid disk placements for (1 or 2).
        Returns:
        An array containing all valid moves for the specified player.

        private void placeDisk(DiskPlacement diskPlacement,
                       int player)
                throws InvalidMoveException
        Places a disk on the grid at the specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        diskPlacement - The disk placement.
        player - The player (player one or player two).
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - The specified disk placement is invalid.

      • checkMove

        private boolean checkMove(int x,
                          int y,
                          int player)
        Checks whether the specified move is valid.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the disk placement.
        y - The y-coordinate of the disk placement.
        player - The index of the player making the move.
        Returns:
        True if the specified move is valid.

      • makeMove

        private void makeMove(int x,
                      int y,
                      int player)
        Performs a move by placing a disk at the specified position.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the disk placement.
        y - The y-coordinate of the disk placement.
        player - The index of player making the move.

      • checkDirections

        private boolean checkDirections(int x,
                                int y,
                                int player,
                                boolean flip)
        Checks in all (eight) directions from the specified coordinate for flippable disks.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the starting point on the grid.
        y - The y-coordinate of the starting point on the grid.
        player - The player index. (1 or 2).
        flip - True to actually flip disks (and mutate the grid state).
        Returns:
        True if any flippable disks were found.

      • recurseDirection

        private boolean recurseDirection(int x,
                                 int y,
                                 int dx,
                                 int dy,
                                 int player,
                                 boolean flip,
                                 boolean flag)
        Recurses the direction specified by (dx, dy) and checks for flippable disks according to the Othello game logic.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the starting point on the grid.
        y - The y-coordinate of the starting point on the grid.
        dx - The x-coordinate of the direction to recurse towards.
        dy - The y-coordinate of the direction to recurse towards.
        player - The player index. (1 or 2).
        flip - True if disks should be flipped when found flippable.
        flag - MUST be set to false when called externally.
        Returns:
        True if the direction gives a valid move for the specified coordinates.
